thread.title: Chocolate Shamrock Shake Hits The McDonald's Menu
thread.title_full: Chocolate Shamrock Shake Hits The McDonald's Menu

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Chocolate Shamrock Shake Hits The McDonald's Menu
text:
Secret menu orders tend to be customers' favorites at popular chains like Starbucks and Taco Bell. As the popularity of menu hacking rages on, fast-food spots have embraced their fans' dedication and added creative riffs to their permanent menus. The latest is a twist on McDonald's beloved Shamrock Shake .
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below For years, customers in-the-know have requested that their minty soft-serve shake be blended with a chocolate shake on the DL. But now the secret-menu Chocolate Shamrock Shake is finally getting its moment to shine on the real Mickey D's menu.
It will join not only the original mint drink but a Shamrock Chocolate Chip Frapp√© (mocha frappe, shamrock shake syrup, whipped cream) and a Shamrock Mocha (chocolate syrup, espresso, steamed milk, shamrock shake syrup), Brand Eating reports .
